mapper.insert: insert into j_subject (j_no, j_subject_name, j_sub_prof, j_semester, j_grade, j_is_passed, j_t_code, j_score, j_limit_stu) values (j_subject_seq.nextval, #{subjectName}, #{professor.id}, #{selectNo.no}, #{grade}, #{passed.code}, #{siteCode.code}, #{score}, #{limitStu})
mapper.select:
select A.j_no as no, A.j_subject_name as subjectName, C.u_prof_name as "professor.name", D.s_seme_select as "selectNo.semeSelect", A.j_grade as grade, B.is_passed as "passed.passedName", E.t_name as "siteCode.name", A.j_score as score, A.j_division as division, A.j_limit_stu as limitStu
from j_subject A, j_is_passed B, u_professor C, s_semester D, t_sitemap E where A.j_sub_prof = C.u_prof_id and A.j_semester = D.s_no and A.j_is_passed = B.pass_code and A.j_t_code = E.t_code

select A.j_no as no, A.j_subject_name as subjectName, C.u_prof_name as "professor.name", A.j_is_passed as "slectNo.code", D.s_seme_select as "selectNo.semeSelect", A.j_grade as grade, B.is_passed as "passed.passedName", E.t_name as "siteCode.name", A.j_score as score, A.j_division as division, A.j_limit_stu as limitStu
from j_subject A, j_is_passed B, u_professor C, s_semester D, t_sitemap E where A.j_sub_prof = C.u_prof_id and A.j_semester = D.s_no and A.j_is_passed = B.pass_code and A.j_t_code = E.t_code
and A.j_semester = #{selectNo.no}
and A.j_subject_name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'
and C.u_prof_name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%'

select A.j_no as no, A.j_subject_name as subjectName, A.j_sub_prof as "professor.id", A.j_semester as "selectNo.no", A.j_grade as grade, A.j_is_passed as "passed.code", A.j_t_code as "siteCode.code", A.j_score as score, A.j_limit_stu as limitStu, B.E_NO as no, B.E_ENROLLDAY as enrollDay, B.E_J_SUBJECT_NO as "subject.no", B.E_ENROLLTIME as enrollTime, B.E_ENROLLNUM as enrollNum from j_subject A, E_ENROLLMENT B where j_sub_prof = #{value}

select A.j_no as no, A.j_subject_name as subjectName, C.u_prof_id as "professor.id", D.s_seme_select as "selectNo.semeSelect", A.j_grade as grade, B.pass_code as "passed.code", E.t_name as "siteCode.name", A.j_score as score, A.j_division as division, A.j_limit_stu as limitStu
from j_subject A, j_is_passed B, u_professor C, s_semester D, t_sitemap E where A.j_sub_prof = C.u_prof_id and A.j_semester = D.s_no and A.j_is_passed = B.pass_code and A.j_t_code = E.t_code and A.j_no = #{value}
select j_is_passed from j_subject where j_no = #{value}

select j_no as no, j_subject_name as subjectName, j_sub_prof as "professor.id", j_semester as "selectNo.no", j_grade as grade, j_is_passed as "passed.code", j_t_code as "siteCode.code", j_score as score, j_limit_stu as limitStu
from j_subject where j_sub_prof = #{value}

select A.j_no as no, A.j_subject_name as subjectName, E.t_code as "siteCode.code", C.u_prof_id as "professor.id", C.u_prof_name as "professor.name", D.s_seme_select as "selectNo.semeSelect", A.j_grade as grade, B.is_passed as "passed.passedName", E.t_name as "siteCode.name", A.j_score as score, A.j_limit_stu as limitStu from j_subject A, j_is_passed B, u_professor C, s_semester D, t_sitemap E where A.j_sub_prof = C.u_prof_id and A.j_semester = D.s_no and A.j_is_passed = B.pass_code and A.j_t_code = E.t_code and A.j_no = #{value}
mapper.update: update j_subject set j_subject_name = #{subjectName}, j_sub_prof = #{professor.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, j_semester = #{selectNo.no, jdbcType=INTEGER}, j_grade = #{grade}, j_is_passed = #{passed.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, j_t_code = #{siteCode.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, j_score = #{score}, j_limit_stu = #{limitStu} where j_no = #{no}
update j_subject set j_subject_name = #{subjectName}, j_limit_stu = #{limitStu}, j_is_passed = #{passed.code}, j_grade = #{grade}, j_sub_prof = #{professor.id}, j_score = #{score} where j_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select B.J_SUBJECT_NAME as subjectName, C.U_prof_name as "professor.name", D.S_SEME_SELECT as "selectNo.semeSelect", B.J_GRADE as grade, E.IS_PASSED as "passed.passedName", F.T_NAME as "siteCode.name", B.J_SCORE as score, A.E_ENROLLDAY as enday, A.E_ENROLLTIME as entime FROM E_ENROLLMENT A, J_SUBJECT B, U_PROFESSOR C, S_SEMESTER D, J_IS_PASSED E, T_SITEMAP F WHERE A.E_J_SUBJECT_NO = B.J_NO AND B.J_SUB_PROF = C.U_PROF_ID AND B.J_SEMESTER = D.S_NO AND B.J_IS_PASSED = E.PASS_CODE AND B.J_T_CODE = F.T_CODE AND B.J_SUB_PROF = #{value}
